findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The Solidity style guide is not followed, which can lead to readability and maintainability issues.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly designed and implemented, which can lead to issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations in arithmetic calculations is not correct, which can lead to loss of precision.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Local variables are not initialized before use, which can lead to unpredictable behavior.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are not properly validated, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods do not check for success, which can lead to incorrect assumptions about the transfer status.
